mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_contents WHERE product_status = 1 AND product_seq = #{productSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_contents SET product_views = product_views + 1 WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, 1 as sort_order FROM product_contents WHERE product_seq > (SELECT product_seq FROM product_contents WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq}) AND product_status = 1 UNION ALL SELECT *, 2 as sort_order FROM product_contents WHERE product_seq <= (SELECT product_seq FROM product_contents WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq}) AND product_status = 1 ) AS preview ORDER BY sort_order, product_seq ASC LIMIT 8
